About Me

I'm a freelance web developer, currently learning Front-End UI Design

Remember MySpace and Vampire Freaks? Yeah, I miss those days too... I used to be obsessed with having a profile page that reflected who I was back in those days. I never thought to learn how to create my own profile from scratch back then. But I was always curious about how it's done. And I sure didn't think about making this my career!
